alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 4:54PM CDT until May 17 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Florala, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Samson, Paxton, Earlytown, Hacoda, Pera, Gaskin, Weeks, Sellersville, Marl, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Lakewood, Ganer, Flowersville and Lowery. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
